summary: This document is a chain of emails from September 2021 regarding a discovery request for the Ghislaine Maxwell trial. It involves FBI Victim Services Division personnel coordinating to collect all communications with victims, witnesses, and their attorneys to be turned over to the U.S. Attorney's Office. The emails reference a prior in-person contact with a victim in April 2021.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the subject of the New York investigation alongside Ghislaine Maxwell, with a trial scheduled for November 2021.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as the co-subject of the New York investigation with Jeffrey Epstein, with a trial scheduled for November 2021.

persons.name: Program Manager
persons.role: Program Manager, Victim Program Management Unit
persons.context: FBI employee sending and forwarding the discovery request for victim/witness communications related to the Epstein/Maxwell case.

persons.name: AUSA
persons.context: Mentioned as being present during an in-person contact with a victim at the Farmington RA in April 2021.

persons.name: NY Agent
persons.context: Mentioned as being present during an in-person contact with a victim at the Farmington RA in April 2021.

connections.description: Named together as the subjects of the New York investigation (50D-NY-3027571) with a joint trial scheduled.
The Program Manager copies SA on an email to coordinate on the discovery request for the Epstein/Maxwell case.
Both were present during an in-person contact with a victim at the Farmington RA in April 2021.

events.title: In-person victim contact at Farmington RA
events.description: A victim met with an attorney and a New York agent at the Farmington RA, with an AUSA also present.

events.title: Scheduled trial for Epstein/Maxwell investigation
events.description: The New York investigation of Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell (50D-NY-3027571) was scheduled for trial.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division was actively collecting all communications (texts, emails, voicemails) with victims, witnesses, and their attorneys for discovery in the Ghislaine Maxwell trial as of September 2021.
A victim had an in-person meeting at the 'Farmington RA' in April 2021 with an attorney, a New York agent, and an AUSA present.
The discovery request had a tight deadline, requiring information by COB on Monday, September 13, 2021, indicating urgent trial preparation.
The document references the specific New York investigation case number: 50D-NY-3027571.
The email chain shows internal FBI coordination between a Program Manager and a Special Agent (SA) regarding victim-related discovery.
